author: hwright
msg: Followup to r37324 by using a function-style macro, in place of a
statement-style macro, to ensure users understand the explicit return.
(svn_error_wrap_apr): If child is SVN_NO_ERROR, return SVN_NO_ERROR.

author: stylesen
msg: 'unlocked', instead check directly based on the function return value.

author: hwright
msg: Following up to the recent work on adding a stack trace to errors, create
a new macro which returns a wrapped error.  Use that new macro in the
(SVN_ERR): Use SVN_ERR_RETURN(), and let it be conditionally defined.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_wc__ensure_directory): Let's use the SVN_ERR() macro, shall we?
Also, tighten the scope of an error variable.

author: stylesen
msg: Prevent opening GNOME dialog in order to get the password for default keyring,
alternatively get it through a prompt.
(unlock_gnome_keyring): Make this function to return a boolean value on
not move on to the next provider.
